notif.no-clip-for-actor: No clip recorded for this actor
notif.clip-exists: Clip already exists for this actor. Shift click to overwrite.
notif.forge-cache: Overwriting creates a new audio clip. Please manually remove old clips if your storage space is running low.
notif.no-media-devices: Microphone permissions error. Please check the readme on GitHub for a solution.

ui.button-tooltip-record: Click to record. Shift-click to overwrite.
ui.button-tooltip-playback: Click to playback to GM. Shift-click to playback to all players.

players-record-owned.name: Allow Owner recording
players-record-owned.hint: Enable to let players record and playback on their owned actors. Requires FILES_UPLOAD permission for players.

players-playback-limited.name: Allow Limited & Observer playback
players-playback-limited.hint: Enable to let players playback clips on actors they have Limited or Observer permissions on. Players cannot record to these actors.

dark-buttons.name: Use dark buttons
dark-buttons.hint: Enable to darken the buttons. Useful for some sheets where the play button is hard to see.
